Constructor Detail

LargeComet

public LargeComet(double xPos,
                  double yPos,
                  double xVel,
                  double yVel)
Creates a new large comet. Large comets should have radius 40.

Parameters:
xPos - The location of the comet in the x direction
yPos - The location of the comet in the y direction
xVel - The velocity of the comet in the x direction
yVel - The velocity of the comet in the y direction
Method Detail

explode

public java.util.Vector<Comet> explode()
Splits this comet into pieces.

Specified by:
explode in class Comet
Returns:
A vector containing two medium comets with the same location as this comet, but randomly chosen velocities.
